name: watcher-overlay
description: Overlay fullscreen transparent Electron app with click-through, top taskbar, and dashboard webview (Calendar, ChatGPT, Settings, Trading placeholder).
author: Watcher <dev@watcher.local>

scripts.dev: npm install && npm run build:ts && ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true electron --no-sandbox .
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ts && electron-builder --linux AppImage deb

linux.synopsis: Transparent overlay with click-through and dashboard
